attributes.action: Make The Changes Dont Let Baby P Be Forgotten.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Listen to children who have been abused.Open your heart to understand their fears,only when you listen will you be able to understand,visit Schools and see what our children want and how they feel .Change the laws, so that social workers have a safe number of cases to look after, and that they dont need to go to managers for approval to remove a child if they think he/she is at risk.Provide social workers with assistants to help with case loads 2 people are better than 1 The children are our future and we should ensure that we have plenty of provision for them so that we can provide them with safe stable and loving enviroments. Why not have a national fundraising day in memory of baby P to help provide funds to assist in the protection of all children at risk,With all of the cabinet taking part so the public can see change happening.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
